## Champions Cohorts

NMFS Openscapes Champions program is a mentorship and professional development opportunity for individuals and research teams in NOAA Fisheries.

## Upcoming NMFS Openscapes Cohorts

* Summer 2022 SEFSC

* Oct-Dec 2022 cohorts will be happening concurrently at AFSC, NWFSC, SWFSC, and SEFSC with participation by PIFSC, WCRO and SERO staff. 


## Past NMFS Openscapes Cohorts

**NWFSC Spring 2021** Champions cohort of 30+ scientists at the Northwest Fisheries Science Center.

**[FDD Fall 2021](https://github.com/Openscapes/2021-fdd)** This was a Champions cohort for Fisheries Dependent Data users (FDD).

**[NMFS Fall 2021](https://github.com/Openscapes/2021-nmfs)** This was a Champions cohort of scientists across 4 science centers: AFSC, NWFSC, NEFSC and SEFSC.

**AFSC Winter 2022** Champions cohort at the Alaska Fisheries Science Center.
